thread.title: LEO Privacy Guard Celebrates Position As #1 Ranked Security App
thread.title_full: LEO Privacy Guard Celebrates Position As #1 Ranked Security App - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: LEO Privacy Guard Celebrates Position As #1 Ranked Security App
text:
Developed by Leomaster and available for iOS and Android devices, LEO Privacy Guard celebrates its position as #1 ranked security app within India’s competitive security app market. Available now in the App Store and Google Play.
Cupertino, CA (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
According to a latest report released by the leading app ranking firm App Annie;within the 2015 global mobile app market, 5 out of the top 10 most downloaded apps in India are mobile security apps. This is a rather interesting fact considering the recently publicized discussion paper floated by TRAI (Telecom Regulatory Authority of India) which claimed that mobile apps could jeopardize national and individual security, and also at a time when a nationwide debate around ‘net neutrality’ rages on.
Amongst the most downloaded mobile security apps, the recently launched LEO Privacy Guard, a product of Leomaster has been ranked in the top mobile application tools in several popular smartphone markets, including India, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Russia. The app is currently ranked top 5 in the mobile app market in these countries, and is ranked 10th in overall performance. In India, the app is ranked #1 in the Google Play Top App Charts and is the highest ranking mobile security app.
Since the app’s global launch in November 2014, LEO Privacy Guard boasts tens of millions of loyal users around the world. The security app’s latest edition LEO Privacy Guard 2.0, released in April 2015, was downloaded 10 million times within several days after its release. The highly-rated app is a privacy steward for free, providing services ranging from app locking, privacy protection and app management and is committed to personal privacy protection and data security.
Leo Privacy Guard, the number one security app, is available now for iPhone and iPad in the App Store at: https://itunes.apple.com/app/leo-privacy-guard-private/id1013745810
A dedicated version for Android devices is also available via Google Play at: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.leo.appmaster&hl=en
About Leomaster
Headquartered in Shenzhen, China and founded in 2014, Leomaster has received millions of dollars of funding from Amer International Group since its inception.
With operations in India and Hong Kong, Leomaster are committed to developing world class mobile applications.
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/appshout/leo-privacy-guard/prweb13024421.htm
